name: Neurons
description:
This game is an entry for the Global Game Jam 2023. The GGJ entry page can be found here.

You play as the only healthy neuron left of Juan. You have the ability to claim neutral neurons to collect memories but your power comes with a cost, as every time you attempt to capture a neuron, you lose an amount of brain power. You regain a portion of it when you capture a neuron and more so when you capture a rare memory by solving the mazes. As you progress through the game, you begin to uncover various memories. With each collected memory, the more you remember about yourself.

Controls:
Left Click and Drag - Connect Neurons/Maze
Esc - Quit Game
